conclusion: Need to analyze the velocity-time graph to determine if the particle returned to its starting point at 3 seconds.
Initial velocity of the particle at t = 0 is 2 m/s.
The graph shows a particle moving in a straight line starting from a velocity of 2 m/s at t = 0.
The particle will return to its starting point if it returns to the same velocity at t = 3 seconds.
Since the particle starts at 2 m/s and continues to move in the same direction, it will return to its starting point at t = 3 seconds.
Since the particle returns to the same velocity at t = 3 seconds, it has returned to its starting point.
